original_text: When the men of the place asked him about his wife, he said, “She is my sister,” for he feared to say, “My wife,” thinking, “lest the men of the place should kill me because of Rebekah,” because she was attractive in appearance.
korean_text: 그 곳 사람들이 그의 아내에 대하여 물으매 그가 말하기를 그는 내 누이라 하였으니 리브가는 보기에 아리따우므로 그 곳 백성이 리브가로 말미암아 자기를 죽일까 하여 그는 내 아내라 하기를 두려워함이었더라

sentences.original_text: When the men of the place asked him
sentences.korean_translation: 그 땅 사람들이 그에게 물었을 때

sentences.original_text: lest the men of the place should kill me
sentences.korean_translation: 그 땅 사람들이 나를 죽일까 두려워하여

sentences.original_text: because she was attractive in appearance
